results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: (በቅጣቱ ውስጥ) ከቀሪዎቹ የሆነችው አሮጊት ብቻ ስትቀር፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እናንተም ያነጋችሁ ስትሆኑ በእነርሱ (መኖሪያዎች) ላይ (በቀን) ታልፋላችሁ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
